column1: Congratulations to Oklahoma’s NEWEST Congresswoman @stephaniebice!  In the State Senate @stephaniebice  earned a reputation as an effective conservative leader. I’m excited to have her join the rest of the Oklahoma Delegation in Congress.

I am deeply honored that my neighbors my fellow Oklahomans the voters of the Third District overwhelmingly voted for me to continue to be their voice in Washington D.C.   I look forward to continuing to work for the great people of #OK03. https://t.co/HcAyA8ap1U
Congratulations @krhern on your victory tonight!  @krhern is the businessman #OK01 deserves in Congress.
Congrats to my friend @MarkwayneMullin on his victory in #OK02!  A businessman a family man and rancher @MarkwayneMullin brings Oklahoma common-sense to Congress.

.@ColeForCongress is a dedicated leader- congrats to @ColeForCongress on his victory tonight!  @ColeForCongress is always on the front lines promoting and protecting our strong conservative Oklahoma values.

Congrats to Oklahoma's Senator and my friend @inhofeforsenate.  The Senate is a greater institution with @inhofeforsenate in its ranks and Oklahoma is better served thanks to his hard work and leadershipl.
After you vote show your support for Frank Lucas for Congress!   RETWEET & LIKE! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/OeL3H0XbLF

It's #ElectionDay!   As your Congressman I've always stood for the values of Oklahoma and been a voice for rural Oklahoma! I'd be honored to have your vote today.  Grab your friends family and neighbors and be sure to exercise your right to #vote! https://t.co/8LDVIBOM3h

In Oklahoma farming isn't just a job- it's a way of life.   I fight for Oklahoma's farmers and ranchers- which is why I received the endorsement of @okfarmbureau.  I'll always be a strong voice for Oklahoma's ag and the 28000+ family farms in #OK03! https://t.co/glZuYJqRPs

Rural hospitals are the backbone of communities across #OK03. Especially during COVID-19 Congress must not allow these critical facilities to close.  I'll always fight for rural hospitals & for affordable high-quality healthcare for my fellow Oklahomans! https://t.co/erGbx8nCKi

Education is the key to success.  We must provide our school children a high quality education- including improving access to STEM education & rural broadband.  I believe in bettering the future for our children! Vote #LucasForCongress! https://t.co/o21kUiLbZq

Oklahoma's small businesses are vital to the economies of our local communities.   In March I supported the #PaycheckProtectionProgram which saved 66000+ small businesses throughout #OK03.   I will ALWAYS support small businesses! Vote #LucasForCongress! https://t.co/yXBlQRVjaw

TOMORROW is ELECTION DAY!   Be sure to make a plan to vote and know your polling location so YOU can help make a difference in Oklahoma's 3rd District → https://t.co/9dFxdtzMLG  I'm counting on YOUR support tomorrow! Help spread the word to VOTE Frank Lucas for Congress! #Vote https://t.co/4gid1iqQUA

With only 2 DAYS till Election Day it’s important to know the issues and what I stand for. Simply put I’ll always put Oklahomans first.  As a lifelong Oklahoman I am committed to serving #OK03 and being a conservative voice for you in Congress. #VOTE  https://t.co/6EatVDPILl

@JayGoonetilleke @ZoeCongress2020 @RepFrankLucas Thanks for the support! 🇺🇸   With Election Day quickly approaching it’s important to know the issues and what I stand for. Simply put I’ll always put Oklahomans first.  https://t.co/6EatVDPILl

Election Day is 5 DAYS away and In-Person Early Voting begins today!  Please remind your friends family and neighbors to make a plan and vote! Want to vote early? Find your Early Voting location here ↓ https://t.co/V4NhCCiQsU https://t.co/9Oby8HFJJ4

We're exactly 1 WEEK from Election Day!  Recently @NEWS9 released polling from Oklahoma's Third District and it's looking promising- but I still need your help!  Help spread the word to VOTE for Frank Lucas for Congress! https://t.co/9602K41xKX

Congratulations to the next Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United State- Justice Amy Coney Barrett.   Our Nation has seen first hand the impeccable qualifications intelligence and integrity Justice ACB will bring to our Nation’s highest court. https://t.co/Q9X9i8Wu6c

Folks- the most important election is only 10 days away!   Whether you're a Republican Democrat or Independent it's important every Oklahoman vote this coming Election Day! Visit https://t.co/3TJzXmUVxv and make your plan to vote! https://t.co/p2ij6GqLCe

Throughout the 116th Congress Speaker Pelosi and Democrats have continuously put politics over the needs of the American people.   Republicans will RESTORE the American way of life RENEW the American dream and REBUILD the greatest economy in history. https://t.co/2WQO77lAnX

I'm a 5th-generation Oklahoman whose family has farmed in Western Oklahoma for more than 120 years.  I'm a tireless advocate for rural America and conservative values. That's why I'm running for Congress- to stand up for rural Oklahoma.  Read my column: https://t.co/JjwxLRWyFn

Rural Oklahoma is home.  I'm proud to stand up for rural Oklahoma- for our agriculture producers for our Main Street businesses and for our school children who need more access to rural broadband.  Join me in standing up for the values of rural Oklahoma: https://t.co/pajMfluJUR

Today is the last day to register to vote in Oklahoma! 🗳️  With only 25 days until Election Day it's important to make a plan to vote- no matter if you vote early vote absentee or vote in person on Election Day!  Register to vote here: https://t.co/sRzfUebHUC

Oklahoma is a leader in energy production- in both oil and natural gas and wind energy.   I believe in an ‘American First’ energy strategy. We need to reduce overburdensome regulations cut taxes and allow these industries to grow and thrive in Oklahoma. https://t.co/jspW0D08bB

Education is the key to success for the future of children. No matter their zip code whether they live in Oklahoma City or rural Oklahoma we must provide our children with a quality education. https://t.co/JTZuHajdWK

ICYMI: On Saturday @realDonaldTrump nominated Judge Amy Coney Barrett to serve as the next Justice on the U.S. Supreme Court.   Judge Barrett is a highly qualified nominee who will uphold the Constitution and the laws of our great Nation! https://t.co/5nk2kRr9fI

ICYMI: I was endorsed by @okfarmbureau!   Ever since I was elected to Congress I have worked hard to improve the future of ag in our great state. I will always stand for Oklahoma's farmers & ranchers!  Thank you @okfarmbureau for endorsing my campaign.  https://t.co/SEvK76Liv6

From family farms to Main Street businesses Oklahoma's workers are some of the hardest workers in the U.S.  In order to support Oklahoma's businesses & workers I support lowering taxes reducing burdensome regulations and increasing free and fair trade.  Your business matters! https://t.co/I4MYp5tGLk

On September 11 2001 our Nation was forever changed. Today we stand united to mourn the loss of fathers mothers friends and neighbors; and honor the bravery and sacrifice of the first responders.  May America never forget.   And may God bless these United States of America. https://t.co/FUr4bWT0jf

Oklahoma’s economy is strongest when taxes are low and businesses are able to thrive.  Oklahoma's Third District deserves a Representative who lowers taxes & fights for a smaller less intrusive government- I will continue to fight for those principles! https://t.co/D5P4XMC4In

ICYMI: The August #jobsreport shows that the economic comeback is underway and going strong. 🇺🇸   1.37 MILLION jobs were added in August and the unemployment rate fell to 8.4%.  Together we will defeat COVID-19 and rebuild the world's greatest economy! https://t.co/1pJC03ul8K

Rising early and ending the day well after the sun has gone down I've always known my fellow Oklahomans are hard working people.  Just as Oklahomans put their families and communities first I'll always support Oklahoma's workers and their families. https://t.co/c3Qdznb0wb.

Happy Labor Day!  America is the greatest nation on this Earth- all thanks to the American worker.   Today I thank all of Oklahoma's workers of every generation who have helped foster an environment for growth jobs and prosperity in Oklahoma. https://t.co/qoFVBPNLKT

Small businesses are the backbone of Oklahoma's Third Congressional District.   I'm PROUD to support our District's small businesses which is why I voted for the CARES Act and the Paycheck Protection Program! https://t.co/vHxuG310er

Tonight Oklahoma’s voters took the next step to elect another great leader!  As a small business entrepreneur principled conservative and effective State Senator @stephaniebice has proven to Oklahoma’s voters she serves to be the voice of the People.  Congrats @stephaniebice!

Access to high-speed broadband isn't just nice to have it's a necessity for Oklahoma's students!   Broadband gives our educators new teaching opportunities and it allow our students to expand their knowledge beyond the walls of their classroom.  https://t.co/gniMqED0r1

Education has always been a passion of mine and I want Oklahoma's young ones to receive the best education possible.   Education is one of the most important building blocks for success. We need education reform that empowers teachers and encourages students to succeed. https://t.co/SHAjW5PD2B

100 years ago today the #19thAmendment was ratified granting women throughout the United States the right to vote.  Today and every day we remember and honor the many women who broke barriers and fought for equality for all. #WomensVote100  https://t.co/40ymJHrQbi

Earlier this week @realDonaldTrump signed an Executive Order strengthening America's medical supply chain.  Especially during COVID-19 Congress must promote pro-growth proposals that will strengthen our manufacturing base & create more jobs here at home. https://t.co/LgJqbcTcgI

On this day we pay tribute to military service members who were wounded or killed in action.  Today we honor the courage of the great American patriots who have earned the Purple Heart!  #PurpleHeartDay https://t.co/ZyDh3d0J63

Across the U.S. Democratic candidates are far left socialist policies- like Medicare-for-All.  Medicare-for-All would kick 158M Americans off their health insurance plan and would shutter rural hospitals across Oklahoma.  We can't let that happen! https://t.co/mbBkgdZnLi

Yesterday @realDonaldTrump expanded telehealth services to millions of Americans who call America's rural communities home.  Congress must continue to work to ensure Oklahomans have access to an affordable patient-centered healthcare system. https://t.co/bJkVnt4V6M
Happy 230th Birthday @USCG!  Thank you to the many great men and women of Oklahoma who serve within @USCG ranks! https://t.co/KNm58JjSle

The United States is a beacon of hope freedom and opportunity to people around the world. Oklahoma is home to more than 300000 Veterans who fearlessly and faithfully worked to defend the United States and our freedom.  I'm proud to support Oklahoma's veterans! THANK YOU VETS! https://t.co/aTyOdBbT2T

Plain & simple: We can not allow bounties to be placed on the brave young men and women who serve in our Armed Forces.   There is nothing more important than the safety of those who serve in our military our great Nation. I'm proud to support our Military. https://t.co/23XflcQont

Earlier this year I joined my fellow House colleagues in passing the Uyghur Human Rights Policy Act. For years China has unleashing a brutal crackdown on ethnic minorities in Western China.  America must defend those who face religious persecution.  https://t.co/X5YWnaPiRM

The Chinese Communist Party and its tyrannical government remain a top threat not only to the U.S. but the entire globe.  Their hostility mustn't go unchecked. As a beacon of freedom to the world America must hold China accountable for their actions. https://t.co/DF9Q7461sK

Oklahomans have been hard at work- and these figures confirm Oklahoma is helping lead the way in economic recovery from COVID-19.   We still have a ways to go in defeating this virus but we must work to responsibly and safely get Oklahomans back to work! https://t.co/HnGQEwcdso
We’re officially 100 DAYS until Election Day!  Join Team Lucas to ensure the conservative values of Oklahoma are not forgotten by those in Washington D.C. https://t.co/pajMfld93j

Oklahoma's small businesses are the backbone of our communities.   In March I voted for the CARES Act which has provided $13.9 MILLION to small businesses throughout Oklahoma and the Third District provided by the Oklahoma Business Relief Program. https://t.co/VyfPBucfVu

.@realDonaldTrump’s energy plan puts America first.   Joe Biden’s energy plan costs the American people TRILLIONS of dollars and expands an already bloated government bureaucracy.   Oklahomans deserve policies that work for them not against them.  https://t.co/sNOtZWTyTE

Last week Joe Biden announced his $2 TRILLION energy plan- embracing the Green New Deal.   The Democrats’ Green New Deal would cost trillions of dollars and would kill Oklahoma's energy jobs. Oklahomans know the Green New Deal is a bad deal for America! https://t.co/DJMpTAjO8I

ICYMI: The Trump Administration is putting America First and is working hard to expedite a coronavirus vaccine to keep us safe! Thank you @realDonaldTrump for making the vaccine and treatments available as quickly and as safely as possible. https://t.co/EGY6yGisIy

I'm PROUD to support our local law enforcement officials. To Oklahoma's law enforcement officials who put on a uniform every day and uphold their oath- THANK YOU!  Democrats want to defund you but Republicans will never turn our backs on you. https://t.co/kMIGDthsw7
I'm proud to introduce the RAMP-UP Act. Oklahoma's livestock producers need our help and Congress and the State of Oklahoma can deliver!  https://t.co/V3aW2awPEc

Protecting Oklahomans and our country is the highest priority of ⁦@realDonaldTrump⁩!  While some Members of Congress are calling to abolish ICE we must remember how important Oklahoma’s law enforcement officials are that keep our communities safe. https://t.co/gK0FyS9MfY

Happy Independence Day!   Today we celebrate our freedom liberty and love of America. And we recognize and honor the immeasurable sacrifices made by so many to make us a more perfect union.  Happy #4thofJuly Oklahoma! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/fCZIlu4gbs

On November 30 2018 @realDonaldTrump signed the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement. As of today the broken promises of NAFTA are replaced by #USMCA.   #USMCA is a win for Oklahoma’s farmers ranchers and manufacturers.   Thank you @POTUS! #PromisesMadePromisesKept https://t.co/IcczhdPdyM

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for standing up for law and order!  America must learn and better itself from our history- not tear it down in violent mobs. And we must ensure we NEVER defund our police departments.  https://t.co/t2hjuBGZhu

Happy #FathersDay to all of Oklahoma’s terrific fathers grandfathers and father figures.   Today I’m thinking of my dad Ike and that proud moment when we met @NRA President and The Ten Commandments’ famous actor Charlton Heston in Oklahoma. https://t.co/5vJLkizWt0

Wonderful to welcome @realDonaldTrump & @TeamTrump to Tulsa Oklahoma tonight! @realDonaldTrump has DELIVERED three years of #PromisesMadePromisesKept!   The road to keeping the White House and winning back the House starts now! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/LFLAQNRUWg
Wheels down!🛬   Air Force One has landed in the great state of OKLAHOMA! https://t.co/RyYYy06Diw
Next stop —> Tulsa 🇺🇸  #TrumpRallyTulsa #GreatAmericanComeback https://t.co/Xczxhuaj9m

From the Panhandle of Western Oklahoma to the woods of Northeast Oklahoma OKLAHOMA IS TRUMP COUNTRY! I'm excited @realDonaldTrump and @TeamTrump will be making a stop in Tulsa- it's sure to be a campaign rally Oklahomans won't want to miss! https://t.co/2NgyxusEDy
Happy Birthday @realDonaldTrump!   Oklahoma’s Third District is voting for @realDonaldTrump for President in 2020! #GreatAmericanComeback https://t.co/RdVXOr4rQN

Oklahoma's farmers and cattle ranchers are the backbone of our communities.  Recently I urged USDA to provide flexibility in payment dates for cattle ranchers in need of assistance from CFAP.  I'm proud to support & fight for Oklahoma's cattle ranchers! https://t.co/dNYMXeu1h9

America is back! And we are returning to space! 🇺🇸  For the first time in 9 years we have now launched American astronauts on American rockets from American soil. Thank you @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for launching America back into space! 🚀🇺🇸 https://t.co/tFjIXDYiOd

On this #MemorialDay we honor those who paid the ultimate sacrifice defending America’s freedoms.   THANK YOU to all of our fallen heroes the families of those brave men and women and those who enlist to serve and protect our great Nation! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/FWnszRLY0C

THANK YOU to all of Oklahoma's nurses doctors hospital staff and volunteers who are fighting #COVID19 on the frontlines.  Since Congress passed the CARES Act Oklahoma's hospitals and rural health clinics have received over $500 million in aid. https://t.co/LPl7rP5JMf
Oklahoma’s cattlemen deserve answers into USDA’s beef proving investigation.  We just restore confidence in the market and protect our state’s hard-working cattle ranchers. https://t.co/o1umJ9wiMR
Happy #MothersDay   To my mother to my wife Lynda and to all of the moms out there- thank you for all that you do! https://t.co/HC6Mm2qOgJ

ICYMI: Pilots from Altus AFB and Vance AFB flew over Oklahoma City to honor and show support for Oklahoma’s healthcare workers and essential employees.   THANK YOU to all of Oklahoma’s healthcare and frontline workers! We are OKLAHOMA PROUD! https://t.co/raIsk2A2BL

Oklahoma’s oil & natural gas industry is extremely important to our great state and its workers are some of the hardest working in the country!   I’m proud to support President Trump as he continues to fight on behalf of America’s energy producers. https://t.co/ihCPuJB6q4
Wishing you and your family a happy and blessed #Easter ! https://t.co/zELmffUrZJ

Oklahoma's prosperity has made tremendous bounds since many of our families first settled but we still have work to do to ensure a better future for our children and their children's children. https://t.co/mfBS2gdYdd

As the former Chairman of the House Agriculture Committee and the top Republican on the House Science Space and Technology Committee I'll ensure the conservative values of Oklahoma are not lost upon those in Washington D.C.

This week I filed for re-election to continue to serve as your Representative of Oklahoma's Third Congressional District. Serving as the voice for rural Oklahoma has been the honor of a lifetime. https://t.co/mfBS2gdYdd

Welcome to El Reno @ToddPiro! We’re happy to have you in Oklahoma and at one of El Reno’s staples- Sid’s!  If there’s one thing that’s for sure Oklahoma is Trump Country and Oklahomans are excited to re-elect @realDonaldTrump in November! https://t.co/Qb8WIhLbdJ
Happy #PresidentsDay 🇺🇸 https://t.co/tVLyHHoQxN

ICYMI: Yesterday @realDonaldTrump fulfilled another campaign promise- signing #USMCA.   Trade with Mexico & Canada supports over 112000 Oklahoma jobs. This is a bipartisan win for Oklahoma’s farmers workers manufacturers and small businesses.  https://t.co/xshwy0vzAr

Today tens of thousands of Americans gathered in DC to #MarchForLife.   I’m proud to support the thousands of pro-life marchers today and I stand committed to defending the sanctity of human life. #WhyWeMarch https://t.co/GYrXsNcbQM
